mutants.code:
import math

def who_drinks_nth_cola(n: int) -> str:
    arr = ['Sheldon', 'Leonard', 'Penny', 'Rajesh', 'Howard']
    high = 6
    while n > high:
        n -= high
        high *= 2
    high //= 5
    return arr[int(math.ceil(n / high)) - 1]
